column4: after changing xorg.conf, i have GDM coming up okay in 1920x1080, but as soon as i log in, it appears to try to change resolutions again?? because my monitor switches to "Cannot display Mode" .. any ideas?
search for the exact error msg in the forum
ah,  look up your monitor model then see if other ppl have this issue
I'm just a noob and I am no good with hardware issues , I'm just trying to point you to resources that might help
